display_long_description:
🎮 All pet owners, gather up! The VR game "My Puppy" has had a super cool upgrade!
With this update, the game scenes have been upgraded with a full-fledged anime style, which is both cute and dreamy. It will instantly transport you into a wonderful dog world just like in a fairy tale. The joyful world has been upgraded with a variety of interactive gameplay such as frisbee and ball games, making it extremely fun. The dog family has expanded significantly. New members like the soft and cute Corgis, the playful Dachshunds, etc. have joined one after another, fulfilling your dream of having a diverse range of cute pets.
What's even more surprising is that all dog toys and food in the game are fully available for free play! You can freely enjoy a wide variety of toys and feed all kinds of delicious food at will. Completely bid farewell to the troubles and tedium of in-app purchases, and let you fully immerse yourself in the infinite fun of pure pet-raising.
At this moment, with a heart brimming with gratitude, we would like to especially extend our most sincere thanks to the players who have already purchased the game. It is your strong support that has enabled this game to keep growing. In the future, we will continue to update and keep adding more interesting interactive plots to inject more joy into your daily life with your cute pets.
